title: Replace the final Teddy mini-game with a new beautiful interactive ending game

requirements.text: Replace the current final-slide mini-game (the teddy mini-game) with a different beautiful interactive mini-game on the ending slide, so the teddy is no longer shown as the final experience.

quotes: change the teddy game to another beautiful game

acceptanceCriteria: When navigating to the last slide, the teddy artwork and teddy interactions are not shown.
The last slide shows a new interactive mini-game that is visually polished and consistent with the existing romantic theme.
The new mini-game works on both desktop (mouse) and mobile (touch).

requirements.text: Implement the new ending mini-game as a dedicated React component and wire it into the slideshow so it renders as the final slide in place of TeddyGameSlide.

quotes: change the teddy game to another beautiful game

acceptanceCriteria: A new component exists for the ending game (separate from TeddyGameSlide).
frontend/src/components/Slideshow.tsx renders the new ending-game component for the last slide instead of TeddyGameSlide.
Slide count, navigation buttons, swipe navigation, slide indicator, and music controls continue to work exactly as before.

requirements.text: Design the new ending mini-game to feel like a 'beautiful' romantic interaction (e.g., a tap/click-driven visual effect game with progression and a clear end state), and ensure all user-facing text shown within the new game is in English.

quotes: change the teddy game to another beautiful game

acceptanceCriteria: The new game includes clear on-screen instructions in English.
The game provides immediate visual feedback for each interaction (tap/click/drag).
The game has a simple progression (e.g., accumulating a count/collecting items) and an end state (e.g., a completion moment with a replay/reset option).

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Do not edit the immutable hook files listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.

Keep the existing slideshow flow (shayari slides first, ending mini-game as the last slide), navigation controls, swipe navigation, slide indicator, and optional/off-by-default background music behavior intact.
Backend remains a single Motoko actor; no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Adding new authentication or requiring login for the ending game.
Adding backend persistence, leaderboards, or user accounts for the mini-game.
Changing the existing shayari content, number of shayari slides, or the music controls behavior.

preferencesToAdd: Use English for any user-facing text in the app.
